meanings.definition: In a abstemious manner; with self-restraint or moderation.
meanings.sent1: She ate abstemiously, taking only small bites of her salad.
meanings.sent2: He abstemiously avoided the tempting desserts at the party.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel abstemiously stored only a few nuts for the winter.
meanings.sent4: The monk abstemiously fasted for days to cleanse his spirit.
meanings.sent5: The athlete abstemiously trained every day to improve his performance.

meanings.definition: Characterized by abstinence or moderation in eating or drinking.
meanings.sent1: Her abstemious diet consisted mainly of fruits and vegetables.
meanings.sent2: The abstemious man rarely indulged in rich foods or alcohol.
meanings.sent3: The abstemious cat refused to eat any treats, sticking to its regular food.
meanings.sent4: The abstemious lifestyle she led impressed her health-conscious friends.
meanings.sent5: His abstemious habits helped him maintain a healthy weight and lifestyle.
